Text: ok let me ask a n00b question. how am i gonna burn 7.58 gb on one dvd that can contain 4 gb?

You can't - it's a DVD9 so you need a DL DVD (and burner capable of burning Dual Layer DVDs - most newer burners are)
...OR you can compress it to a DVD5 yourself (by ripping unwanted audio and compressing the video etc)
